00042 #define DEBUG_SUBSYSTEM S_CLASS
00043 
00044 #include <libcfs/libcfs.h>
00045 #include <obd_class.h>
00046 #include <obd_support.h>
00047 #include <lustre_fid.h>
00048 #include <libcfs/list.h>
00049 #include <cl_object.h>
00050 #include "cl_internal.h"
00051 
00052 static void cl_lock_trace0(int level, const struct lu_env *env,
00053                            const char *prefix, const struct cl_lock *lock,
00054                            const char *func, const int line)
00055 {
00056         struct cl_object_header *h = cl_object_header(lock->cll_descr.cld_obj);
00057         CDEBUG(level, "%s: %p (%p/%d) at %s():%d\n",
00058                prefix, lock, env, h->coh_nesting, func, line);
00059 }
00060 #define cl_lock_trace(level, env, prefix, lock)                         \
00061         cl_lock_trace0(level, env, prefix, lock, __FUNCTION__, __LINE__)
00062 
00072 void cl_lock_slice_add(struct cl_lock *lock, struct cl_lock_slice *slice,
00073                        struct cl_object *obj,
00074                        const struct cl_lock_operations *ops)
00075 {
00076         ENTRY;
00077         slice->cls_lock = lock;
00078         list_add_tail(&slice->cls_linkage, &lock->cll_layers);
00079         slice->cls_obj = obj;
00080         slice->cls_ops = ops;
00081         EXIT;
00082 }
00083 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cl_lock_slice_add);
00084 
00085 void cl_lock_fini(const struct lu_env *env, struct cl_lock *lock)
00086 {
00087         ENTRY;
00088 
00089         cl_lock_trace(D_DLMTRACE, env, "destroy lock", lock);
00090 
00091         while (!list_empty(&lock->cll_layers)) {
00092                 struct cl_lock_slice *slice;
00093 
00094                 slice = list_entry(lock->cll_layers.next,
00095                                 struct cl_lock_slice, cls_linkage);
00096                 list_del_init(lock->cll_layers.next);
00097                 slice->cls_ops->clo_fini(env, slice);
00098         }
00099         POISON(lock, 0x5a, sizeof(*lock));
00100         EXIT;
00101 }
00102 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cl_lock_fini);
00103 
00104 int cl_lock_init(const struct lu_env *env, struct cl_lock *lock,
00105                  const struct cl_io *io)
00106 {
00107         struct cl_object *obj = lock->cll_descr.cld_obj;
00108         struct cl_object *scan;
00109         int result = 0;
00110         ENTRY;
00111 
00112         /* Make sure cl_lock::cll_descr is initialized. */
00113         LASSERT(obj != NULL);
00114 
00115         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&lock->cll_layers);
00116         list_for_each_entry(scan, &obj->co_lu.lo_header->loh_layers,
00117                             co_lu.lo_linkage) {
00118                 result = scan->co_ops->coo_lock_init(env, scan, lock, io);
00119                 if (result != 0) {
00120                         cl_lock_fini(env, lock);
00121                         break;
00122                 }
00123         }
00124         RETURN(result);
00125 }
00126 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cl_lock_init);
00127 
00134 const struct cl_lock_slice *cl_lock_at(const struct cl_lock *lock,
00135                                        const struct lu_device_type *dtype)
00136 {
00137         const struct cl_lock_slice *slice;
00138 
00139         ENTRY;
00140 
00141         list_for_each_entry(slice, &lock->cll_layers, cls_linkage) {
00142                 if (slice->cls_obj->co_lu.lo_dev->ld_type == dtype)
00143                         RETURN(slice);
00144         }
00145         RETURN(NULL);
00146 }
00147 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cl_lock_at);
00148 
00149 void cl_lock_cancel(const struct lu_env *env, struct cl_lock *lock)
00150 {
00151         const struct cl_lock_slice *slice;
00152         ENTRY;
00153 
00154         cl_lock_trace(D_DLMTRACE, env, "cancel lock", lock);
00155         list_for_each_entry_reverse(slice, &lock->cll_layers, cls_linkage) {
00156                 if (slice->cls_ops->clo_cancel != NULL)
00157                         slice->cls_ops->clo_cancel(env, slice);
00158         }
00159 
00160         EXIT;
00161 }
00162 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cl_lock_cancel);
00163 
00171 int cl_lock_enqueue(const struct lu_env *env, struct cl_io *io,
00172                     struct cl_lock *lock, struct cl_sync_io *anchor)
00173 {
00174         const struct cl_lock_slice      *slice;
00175         int                             rc = -ENOSYS;
00176 
00177         ENTRY;
00178 
00179         list_for_each_entry(slice, &lock->cll_layers, cls_linkage) {
00180                 if (slice->cls_ops->clo_enqueue == NULL)
00181                         continue;
00182 
00183                 rc = slice->cls_ops->clo_enqueue(env, slice, io, anchor);
00184                 if (rc != 0)
00185                         break;
00186         }
00187         RETURN(rc);
00188 }
00189 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cl_lock_enqueue);
00190 
00195 int cl_lock_request(const struct lu_env *env, struct cl_io *io,
00196                     struct cl_lock *lock)
00197 {
00198         struct cl_sync_io       *anchor = NULL;
00199         __u32                   enq_flags = lock->cll_descr.cld_enq_flags;
00200         int                     rc;
00201         ENTRY;
00202 
00203         rc = cl_lock_init(env, lock, io);
00204         if (rc < 0)
00205                 RETURN(rc);
00206 
00207         if ((enq_flags & CEF_ASYNC) && !(enq_flags & CEF_AGL)) {
00208                 anchor = &cl_env_info(env)->clt_anchor;
00209                 cl_sync_io_init(anchor, 1, cl_sync_io_end);
00210         }
00211 
00212         rc = cl_lock_enqueue(env, io, lock, anchor);
00213 
00214         if (anchor != NULL) {
00215                 int rc2;
00216 
00217                 /* drop the reference count held at initialization time */
00218                 cl_sync_io_note(env, anchor, 0);
00219                 rc2 = cl_sync_io_wait(env, anchor, 0);
00220                 if (rc2 < 0 && rc == 0)
00221                         rc = rc2;
00222         }
00223 
00224         if (rc < 0)
00225                 cl_lock_release(env, lock);
00226         RETURN(rc);
00227 }
00228 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cl_lock_request);
00229 
00233 void cl_lock_release(const struct lu_env *env, struct cl_lock *lock)
00234 {
00235         ENTRY;
00236 
00237         cl_lock_trace(D_DLMTRACE, env, "release lock", lock);
00238         cl_lock_cancel(env, lock);
00239         cl_lock_fini(env, lock);
00240         EXIT;
00241 }
00242 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cl_lock_release);
00243 
00244 const char *cl_lock_mode_name(const enum cl_lock_mode mode)
00245 {
00246         static const char * const names[] = {
00247                 [CLM_READ]    = "R",
00248                 [CLM_WRITE]   = "W",
00249                 [CLM_GROUP]   = "G"
00250         };
00251         CLASSERT(CLM_MAX == ARRAY_SIZE(names));
00252         return names[mode];
00253 }
00254 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cl_lock_mode_name);
00255 
00259 void cl_lock_descr_print(const struct lu_env *env, void *cookie,
00260                          lu_printer_t printer,
00261                          const struct cl_lock_descr *descr)
00262 {
00263         const struct lu_fid  *fid;
00264 
00265         fid = lu_object_fid(&descr->cld_obj->co_lu);
00266         (*printer)(env, cookie, DDESCR"@"DFID, PDESCR(descr), PFID(fid));
00267 }
00268 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cl_lock_descr_print);
00269 
00273 void cl_lock_print(const struct lu_env *env, void *cookie,
00274                    lu_printer_t printer, const struct cl_lock *lock)
00275 {
00276         const struct cl_lock_slice *slice;
00277 
00278         (*printer)(env, cookie, "lock@%p", lock);
00279         cl_lock_descr_print(env, cookie, printer, &lock->cll_descr);
00280         (*printer)(env, cookie, " {\n");
00281 
00282         list_for_each_entry(slice, &lock->cll_layers, cls_linkage) {
00283                 (*printer)(env, cookie, "    %s@%p: ",
00284                            slice->cls_obj->co_lu.lo_dev->ld_type->ldt_name,
00285                            slice);
00286                 if (slice->cls_ops->clo_print != NULL)
00287                         slice->cls_ops->clo_print(env, cookie, printer, slice);
00288                 (*printer)(env, cookie, "\n");
00289         }
00290         (*printer)(env, cookie, "} lock@%p\n", lock);
00291 }
00292 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cl_lock_print);
